channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Value investing is finally excelling again in 2025 — but there is one catch for Americans
item.description: The concept of value investing was pioneered in the U.S. roughly a century ago. But lately, the approach has had far more success abroad.

item.title: This Buffett favorite is one of 4 cheap stocks the ‘smartest money’ has been buying lately
item.description: It’s bullish when insiders invest their own money into their companies — especially when those executives and directors have a record of savvy timing.

item.title: Why GM investors seem to like the idea of spending billions to boost U.S. production
item.description: GM’s stock climbs as the carmaker’s $4 billion investment to expand existing capacity is viewed as a better than building new plants, one analyst said...

item.title: Social Security’s new commissioner, rule reversals and cost cuts: Here’s everything that’s happening at the agency
item.description: A Social Security “war room,” threats to shut the agency, worker buyouts and a restraining order — here’s a timeline of what has taken place so far th...

item.title: Here’s how the 55% U.S. tariffs on China are broken down
item.description: President Trump, in a post on Truth Social, said the U.S. is “getting a total of 55% tariffs.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
